main event: On August 15, 1957, a witness observed two bright, round, disc-shaped objects in Helena, Montana, which disappeared suddenly after about 10 seconds.
interesting points: The objects were described as being noiseless and bright like car headlights., The witness estimated the objects were about 400 feet away when observed., The witness was taking pictures in the dark when the objects appeared., The objects were reported to fade away after they appeared., The witness claimed to have seen a similar object in Spokane, Washington.
